CIRCULAR  NO. 20/2005 
 
 
It has been decided that the NCASTP shall be enforced with effect from July 1st, 
2005 and it shall be ensured by the concerned entities that no untrained / uncertified 
person is allowed to carry out the screeners job at the airports in the country.  
 
 
 
(R. C Tayal ) 
Offg. Commissioner of   Security (CA)
